Translations.Text: Do zivy inventar there bol lekcia ona my zadovazit ona pne ich brucho. Z midst z digested food blood ona get pure mlieko lahodny for drinkers
A ovocie z datum palms grapes ona produce intoxicants i mat rad dobry provisions This bol (sufficient) proof ludia chapat
Tvoj Lord inspirovat bee build domov mountains strom hives they build ona
Potom jestn all ovocie nasledovat zamer tvoj Lord precisely Z ich brucho pojdem pne z inak colors wherein there healing ludia! This bol (sufficient) proof ludia zrkadlit
GOD created ONA POTOM He ZAKONCIT TVOJ ZIVOT. He lets some z ona zit stara vek, len zalozit out lenze there bol limit do znalost they acquire. GOD bol Omniscient Omnipotent
